project.name: Email Client-React Project
project.description: I completed this project as part of a team using React to build an email client based on a supplied design and an existing API. The application included features such as pagination, search, and filters, and had a responsive front-end. We utilised TailWind to create a modern UI that interacted seamlessly with the API.
project.moreinfo: I worked on the 'open email' and 'search bar' features of the email client. I am particularly proud of the search bar functionality, which filters/unfilters the emails as the user types. I found this quite challenging to code and learnt a lot, whilst doing it!

project.name: Project Manager- IN PROGRESS
project.description: I built this project manager as part of a team. We were provided with the front-end for this project and were supplied with an API. We built the back-end for this project manager using Object Orientated Programming in PHP. We wrote and employed unit testing to ensure our code worked correctly. .
project.moreinfo: I worked on fetching and displaying all active projects, fetching and displaying a specific task, displaying a specific task in red if it was overdue or grey if it wasn't overdue, writing the unit tests for all stories. I really enjoyed the problem-solving aspect of writing the unit tests in this project.

project.name: Laravel API- COMING SOON
project.description: I built a well-architected API that works with a pre-built React front-end application.
